name: vaporforge
description: Web-based AI coding IDE on Cloudflare Sandboxes

scripts.build:landing: cd landing && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:ui: cd ui && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:info && npm run build:landing && npm run build:ui && npm run build:merge
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler deploy
scripts.changelog: echo 'Requires: gem install github_changelog_generator (Ruby >= 3.2)' && github_changelog_generator --user Aventerica89 --project vaporforge --no-issues --no-author
